segments.text: I think I should join a fitness centre . I am getting a little fat and I'm totally out of shape . Even a quick walk of a few hundred metres leaves me out of breath .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid you are beginning to look a little overweight . You really need to stop smoking . That's the main reason you're unhealthy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess you're right . I've tried stopping , but I just can't seem to quit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you try smoking one cigarette less each day ? How many do you smoke each day now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . So for one month , reduce the number you smoke by one a day . At the end of the month , you'll have quit . You should also buy a tracksuit and go jogging every morning . You don't need to jog far .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I do a few exercises at home , like crunches , I'll soon deal with this waistline .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Be careful when you go jogging . Don't put yourself under too much stress . You're still a smoker shouldn't do too much exercises in your condition .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll join a fitness centre . I'm sure they'll be able to give me more advice . There's one near my office , so I can go before and after work . I don't want to go jogging in the street , so I'll use a treadmill .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea . Remember to eat healthily too . The trainers at the fitness centre will be able to advise you on your diet .
segments.speaker: S2
